Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile

Detailed Description

Class representing wrapper for AS_File.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::OpenMode

Open Modes for AS_Volume_OpenFile.

Enumerator:
Closed  Only an output state.
Read  File can only be read.
Append  File is opened to append.

Member Function Documentation

SInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::Open ( String^   file,
RTFile::OpenMode  access 
)

DESCRIPTION: Opens a file on the specified volume.

Parameters:
[in] file - The file to open is specified with fullPath;
[in] access - the mode in which the file is to be opened (OpenMode.Read or OpenMode.Append)
When the open mode is specified as OpenMode.Read, the file position defaults to 0 (beginning of file). Use RTFile.Seek to change the location. When the open mode is append, the file position defaults to EOF (end-of-file) unless the specified file does not exist on the volume, in which case the file will be created. RTFile.Seek calls are not allowed while in append mode.

NOTES: An error will result if the file indicated with fullPath is not 2048-aligned. If mode is set to OpenMode.Append and the parents in the path specified with fullPath already exist, then a new file will be created automatically if a file of the specified name does not already exist. Once opened in read mode, a file must be closed (see RTFile.Close) and then reopened in append mode in order to write to it. Similarly, a file opened in append mode must be closed and then reopened in read mode in order to read from it.

Returns:
StorageError_None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if the flags are not defined.

StorageError.InvalidAccess - if mode is set to append and writing in RTTD mode is not allowed for volume

StorageError.InvalidOperation - if the volume was not mounted/formatted or if there are open RTFile references

StorageError.FileNotFound - if mode is set to read and file is not found in volume

StorageError.InvalidOperation - if mode is set to append and file length is not multiple of block size

StorageError.Fatal - if mode is set to append and failed to create or write to the file

SInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::Read ( System::UInt32  bytes,
array< System::Byte >^  buffer,
[Out] System::UInt32%   numRead 
)

DESCRIPTION: Reads data from the specified file into the buffer specified.

Parameters:
[in] bytes - the size of buffer to read to.
[in] buffer - buffer used to read data into
[out] numRead - the amount of data actually read into the buffer
The file will be read from its current location. By default, that location is set to 0 (beginning of file) when the file is opened in read mode (see RTFile.Open). Use RTFile.Seek to seek to a different location.

NOTES: The file must already be open and in read mode (see RTFile.Open). If the file was opened in RTFile.Append mode, it must first be closed and then reopened in RTFile.Read mode.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if the flags are not defined.

StorageError.InvalidOperation - if file was opened with mode not set to read

StorageError.Fatal - if failed to read from file

SInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::Write ( System::UInt32  bytes,
array< System::Byte >^  buffer,
[Out] System::UInt32%   numWritten 
)

DESCRIPTION: Writes data to the end of the specified file.

Parameters:
[in] bytes - the size of buffer to read to.
[in] buffer - buffer used to read data into
[out] numWritten - the amount of data actually written from the buffer
NOTES: The file must already be open and in append mode (see RTFile.Open). If the file was opened in RTFile.Read mode, it must first be closed and then reopened in RTFile.Append mode.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if the flags are not defined.

StorageError.InvalidOperation - if file was opened with mode not set to append

StorageError.Fatal - if failed to write to file

SInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::Seek ( System::UInt64  pos  ) 

DESCRIPTION: Sets the location in the specified file that will be the starting position of the next read operation.

Parameters:
[in] pos - The location is given as an offset (in bytes) from the start of the file.
NOTES: An error will result if the file referenced with file was opened in RTFile.Append mode (see RTFile.Open).

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if the flags are not defined.

StorageError.InvalidOperation - if the file was opened with mode not set to read

SInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::Close (  ) 

DESCRIPTION: Closes the specified file to further reading or writing and releases the file's reference and associated memory.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if the flags are not defined.

StorageError.Fatal - if file could not be closed

System:: UInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::UDFPermissions [get, set]

RTFile prop UDF permissions.

RTFile property for setting / retrieving UDF permissions as UInt32 bitfield

defaults :

file = OTHER_Read | GROUP_Read | OWNER_Read | OTHER_ChAttr | GROUP_ChAttr | OWNER_ChAttr

directory = OTHER_Read | GROUP_Read | OWNER_Read | OTHER_ChAttr | GROUP_ChAttr | OWNER_ChAttr | OTHER_Execute | GROUP_Execute | OWNER_Execute

Please refer to UDF 2.6 section 3.3.3.3 on page 70 (http://www.osta.org) for more information and recommendations on setting these permissions for different operating systems.

Definitions:
Bit for a File for a Directory
Execute May execute file May search directory
Write May change file contents May create and delete files
Read May examine file contents May list files in directory
ChAttr May change file attributes May change dir attributes
Delete May delete file May delete directory

Bitfield Values:
OTHER_Execute 0x00000001
OTHER_Write 0x00000002
OTHER_Read 0x00000004
OTHER_ChAttr 0x00000008
OTHER_Delete 0x00000010
GROUP_Execute 0x00000020
GROUP_Write 0x00000040
GROUP_Read 0x00000080
GROUP_ChAttr 0x00000100
GROUP_Delete 0x00000200
OWNER_Execute 0x00000400
OWNER_Write 0x00000800
OWNER_Read 0x00001000
OWNER_ChAttr 0x00002000
OWNER_Delete 0x00004000

RTFile:: MacExtProDosType^ Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::MacExtProDos [get, set]

RTFile prop Mac extended prodos info.

RTFile property for setting / retrieving Mac extended prodos info as RTFile.MacExtProDosType

RTFile:: MacExtHFSType^ Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::MacExtHFS [get, set]

RTFile prop Mac extended HFS info.

RTFile property for setting / retrieving Mac extended HFS info as MacExtHFSType

System:: UInt32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::RTFile::Realtime [get, set]

RTFile prop realtime file.

RTFile property for setting / retrieving streaming reads/writes (no ECC) typically for video record/playback. 0 = off, 1 = on as UInt32
